item.title: Korasi special question
item.dc:creator: @PsychoScapeRSPS PsychoScapeRSPS
item.description:
@PsychoScapeRSPS wrote:

Well first you would have to add the code which makes the special bar appear on the attack styles tab.
Then set a case where the user clicks the special bar, your character does the correct animation, and hit with the right limits.

I know the theory, but donâ€™t actually know how to add it :X Sorry.
